EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - What's New in 8.4 - EMEA/US - 2015.05.21.Email - Follow Up - Attendees
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our What’s New in 8.4 webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
What’s New in 8.4
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for attending our ‘What’s New’ Webinar, introducing all our new features from the Tosca Testsuite 8.4 Release. We hope you enjoyed the webinar and are also excited to try out our new features. Your active participation and engaging questions helped to make the webinar lively and interesting. If you would like to stay up to date with current Tricentis news, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>.
Click here <http://www.tricentis.com/thank-you-page-whats-new-in-tosca-testsuite-8-4-webinar> for a recording of this webinar​, or learn more about our new features and solutions through our What’s New Videos, available here <http://www.tricentis.com/tricentis-tosca-testsuite/what-is-new>.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Gerd Weishaar VP Product Management Tricentis
Roman Zednik Worldwide Director for Pre-Sales Consulting Tricentis
